TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit SessionPageStatePersister extends System.Web.UI.PageStatePersister

summary.span: 在 Web 服务器上存储 ASP.NET 页视图状态。

span.span: Stores ASP.NET page view state on the Web server.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以存储 ASP.NET 页面状态之间的本质上是无状态的 HTTP 请求和响应处理和提供任何网页所需的信息。ASP.NET pages can store state information between the inherently stateless HTTP request and response required to process and serve any Web page. 此状态称为"查看状态"。This state is called "view state." 默认 ASP.NET 持久性机制是要将视图状态存储客户端使用类。The default ASP.NET persistence mechanism is to store view state on the client using the class. 存储视图状态和数据与每个 HTTP 请求和响应采用常规很好地执行，并很大的 Web 场方案中重要，因为它并不重要的 Web 服务器服务请求： 页面状态是在该服务器的当前上下文中可用准确地呈现页。Storing view state and data with each HTTP request and response performs well in general and is important in large Web farm scenarios because it does not matter which Web server services the request: the page state is available in the current context for the server to accurately render the page. 在页到小型设备时，客户端资源有限，或者使用不支持的隐藏的字段元素的标记语言提供服务的位置的情况下，它需要将视图状态存储在服务器上。In scenarios where pages are served to small devices that have limited client-side resources or use a markup language that does not support a hidden field element, it is required to store view state on the server. 几个 ASP.NET 设备页适配器重写`GetStatePersister`方法以返回将页面状态存储在会话对象中的服务器的对象与客户端关联。Several ASP.NET device page adapters override the `GetStatePersister` method to return a object that stores page state on the server in the session object associated with the client. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何编写类返回的实例类而不是默认值类，以将视图状态保存到的服务器端会话对象。The following code example demonstrates how you can write a class to return an instance of the class instead of the default class to save view state to the server-side session object. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.SessionPageStatePersister_1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.SessionPageStatePersister_1/CS/mypageadapter2.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.SessionPageStatePersister_1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.SessionPageStatePersister_1/VB/mypageadapter2.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void Load() cil managed

summary.span: 在 对象对其控件层次结构进行初始化时，对服务器端会话对象中保存的状态进行反序列化并加载该状态。

span.span: Deserializes and loads persisted state from the server-side session object when a object initializes its control hierarchy.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类实现方法以加载页面状态从客户端所关联的对象。The class implements the method to load page state from the object associated with the client.

exception.span: 方法未能成功对向 Web 服务器发送的请求中包含的状态进行反序列化。

span.span: The method could not successfully deserialize the state contained in the request to the Web server.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void Save() cil managed

summary.span: 对 或 属性中包含的任何对象状态进行序列化，并将该状态写入会话对象。

span.span: Serializes any object state contained in the or the property and writes the state to the session object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类实现方法页将状态保存在客户端所关联的对象。The class implements the method to persist page state in the object associated with the client.
